topic.title: Web Seeders in Zeronet?
topic.body: Can someone who knows explain if it is possible to add web seeders to ones own website. Even multiple mirrors for a file. Share the code! This is an essential feature that Zeronet MUST have!

1621239876_17AMQVbBa12XB3xFWKDnP2dCEx92T.body: A great way to help is to seeed peoples stuff. We alll apreceate the work of god

1610754180_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRF.body: Signal is more private than tele. Matrix is more future proof than signal. RetroShare is the Ultimate privacy and free liberty. May god bless retro!

1620756113_17AMQVbBa12XB3xFWKDnP2dCEx92T.body: United-States the great is fallen is fallen and has become the habitation of devils and a hold of every unclean spirit and a cage of every unclean and hateful bird

1620574964_1C6gAPEiSgWRPes1bmpFhWcKGyyT2.body: My opin.. The ulteemity soloution to, is Zeronet + Qbittorrent for large files. Host large files on Qbittorrent + webseeders, and let zero be the hub
